text: Nɨ kamaghɨn damigh gɨvagh, namba 2ɨn dughiamɨn ua mɨtogh. Egh nɨ uan agharir guvim moghɨn mɨtogh egh irɨghɨv ikɨ, egh Judan gumazamiziba amizir arazir kurabar osɨmtɨzimɨn ivezir kuram ateram. Kɨ 40plan dughiaba nɨ ganɨngi, ezɨ dughiar kaba Judabar ikɨzimɨn osɨmtɨzir me ini ikiamin azenibar dɨbobonim ko magh ghu.
